long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CleanTube gives you the power to remove annoying and unnecessary elements, providing a cleaner and more focused experience. Whether it’s hiding the comments section, sidebar recommendations, or other distracting components.

Key Features:

	•	Hide Distractions: Remove elements like suggested videos, comments, and sidebars for a streamlined viewing experience.
	•	Customizable Control: Choose what to hide or show, creating a personalized YouTube experience that suits your needs.
	•	Works on Any Domain: While designed for YouTube, you can enable CleanTube on any website for a distraction-free browsing experience.
	•	Simple and Intuitive: Easy to use interface allows you to quickly toggle elements on and off with a few clicks.
	•	Boost Your Focus: Perfect for those who want to watch content without interruptions or temptations.
